title: Ada Da En Meethu Lyrics Pathinaaru Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Hariharan, Bella Shinde
Song: Ada Da En Meethu
Lyrics : Snehan
Movie Name : Pathinaaru

Ada Da En Meethu devadhai vasanai
Kadhal Idhuvo...
Unnaye enengum kattidum katchigal
Kadhal Idhuvo

Unnai kanum, varam podhum
Edhirkalam vasam vasam varum
Vali-padhai, maram yaavum
Enakaga mazhai mazhai tharum

Yaaro unnai ennai yaar serthadho
Yaaro vasam thannai yaar parthadho
Uyril oru kodi vanavil poothidum
Kadhal Idhuvo...
Edhire ne vandhal vanavil thondridum
kadhal adhuvo ..

Ramyam thadhumbum kanavu
Unnai kandadhum pirandhadhe
Kangalil vazhiyum neeril
Indru, sakkarai thiraludhe

Poi varum veedhiyil yeno
Pudhu vasanai kamaludhe
Kadhalin padalai ingae
Iru jeeven paadidudhe

la la la lal laala
lala lala la..
Mounam vandhu idiyai pola
Manadhil meedhu vizhundhadho
Kadhalile nammai nam ilandhom
Unmai nam unarndhom
En kalandhom,Nam kanavil
Naam azhaindhom

Katrinil azhayum iravil
Indha paravai udhirthadho
Kadhalil mayangum mandhu
Andha kadavuzhum thoduthadho..

Pootiya kadhavin idukil
Pudhu vezhicham nuzhaindhadho ..
Thaimaiyin viralai kondu
Nammai kadhalum varududho...

Unnai kanda nazhil irundhu
Enadhu vazhkai kidaithadho.
Ennuyirai thirakum saavi
Unnadhu uyiril irukudhe ..
Kadhazhiye idhu vesam illai
ingu pedham illai
Edhum illai
pani thuzhiyil sayam illai

Ada Da En Meethu devadhai vasanai
Kadhal Idhuvo...
Unnaye enengum kattidum katchigal
Kadhal Idhuvo

Unnai kanum, varam podhum
Edhirkalam vasam vasam varum
Vali-padhai, maram yaavum
Enakaga mazhai mazhai tharum

Yaaro unnai ennai yaar serthadho
Yaaro vasam thannai yaar parthadho
Uyril oru kodi vanavil poothidum
Kadhal Idhuvo...
Edhire ne vandhal vanavil thondridum
kadhal adhuvo ..
